title: Ni-loaded hydroxyapatite containing various Ca/P ratios for use in the catalytic decomposition of biomass tar at low temperatures
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00250D, Paper
Naokatsu Kannari, Yusuke Yokota, Kazuki Onoduka, Anon Shimizu, Kazuyoshi Sato, Hiroyuki Okazaki, Shunya Yamamoto, Hiroya Abe
Active tar decomposition catalysts are necessary to achieve the highly efficient gasification of biomass at low temperatures (i.e., <600 Â°C). In this study, we prepared Ni-loaded catalysts using hydroxyapatite (HAp)...
